channel.title: Desert Island Discs: Fragment Archive 1960-1969
channel.description: Guests are invited to choose the eight records they would take to a desert island
channel.itunes:summary: Guests are invited to choose the eight records they would take to a desert island
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
